infos.value: Just what do you think you're—
I am Mont, the elder prince of Leonis.
Lilyth, commander of Leonis's second division, «Caelum».
...Lord...Mont?
We have come to support you.
To our aid...? What of...Wezette?
Khury has betrayed us. The alliance has been severed.
We will join your efforts to free Machérie.
That is...a great relief. I am in your debt.
King Robb, let us treat your wounds... This way, please.
Before you start, answer me this.
Let me guess—Schuzelt?
Sorry, but he's still in Wezette—
Darling, no!
Sorry about that. Our dear leader here's got quite a short fuse.
I've dodged faster punches.
When we escaped Wezette Castle, Schuzelt, he—
He sacrificed himself to let you escape, did he? That's just like him.
Yet...do you not find it pitiful?
...Find what pitiful?
That you forced your burden on another kingdom's knight while you turned tail.
Watch your tongue, lest I cut it out.
It's your move, wench.
Lilyth, enough.
But Lord Mont...
We will head to Wezette as soon as we have rescued Machérie.
And we will set Schuzelt free as well—no matter what it takes.
You speak well, but my ears trust naught.
Then keep your eyes open and tell me what they would have you believe.
We're storming the Lion's Den.
...Hmm. Lending us your blades, are you?
Naturally.
We are not your enemy. Believe me.
Not the enemy...?
Very well. But don't think this makes you an ally.
